about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Honest and Efficient Work
about.history_text: Energoreparații is a company of the Promstroi group, one of the largest general construction contractors in the Republic of Moldova. The business started with repair services for turbines, industrial boilers, and other energy equipment, being quickly expanded to engineering installations for water and sewage, heating, ventilation, and air conditioning. Fast, efficient, and honest, Energoreparații has become a renowned and well-known construction company.
about.mission_text: Our goal is to apply the most innovative technologies in the field of engineering, networks, and communications, so that clients can enjoy services at the best quality-price ratio. Our team handles every job, managing projects with the skills and experience our clients have expected. We want our clients to be satisfied with our work, which is why we offer open communication channels throughout each project.
about.team_text: We are a company with over 50 employees, 2 specialized energy production halls, and great ambition. For us, each project represents a challenge, a promise that we can bring new standards to facilities served for our clients. We focus on three directions: we want to grow modern technologies, we want to increase the number of clients, and we want a product for Moldovan companies at high standards and affordable prices.

footer.about_text: Complete energy engineering solutions and premium rental spaces.
